title: Board Definition
description: A WipperSnapper-compatible Board for use in Adafruit IO

boardName.description: Hardware name. Must be unique within this repository.

bootDiskName.description: The name of the disk that the board will appear as when connected in bootloader mode to a computer. e.g. RP2

bootloaderBoardName.description: The name of the board as it appears in tinyuf2 release files. e.g. adafruit_feather_esp32s3

mcuRefVoltage.description: Microcontroller's maximum voltage reference, in Volts.

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of this board.

vendor.description: Name of the company that makes the board.

installMethod.description: The WipperSnapper firmware installation method for this board.

installBoardName.description: (Optional) Name to use instead of `boardName` to look up the firmware asset in the WipperSnapper Arduino Releases

published.description: Whether this board is officially published. When false, it won't appear in the firmware installer, for instance.

components.description: List of available pins and I2C ports for this board.

digitalPins.description: Information about each digital pin present on this board.

direction.description: This pin's direction, either INPUT or OUTPUT. For pins that are input or output ONLY, leave blank if it supports both.

hasPWM.description: If true, this digital pin supports general PWM output, and thus PWM components.

hasServo.description: If true, hasPWM should also be true, and this PWM-enabled pin also supports servo components.

uartTx.description: If true, this pin will be used as the UART transmit pin. There should also be a 'uartRx' property on another pin.

uartRx.description: If true, this pin will be used as the UART receive pin. There should also be a 'uartTx' property on another pin.

isHardwired.description: If true, this pin is wired directly to a built-in component. It will only be available to be selected when adding a component of that type.

then.errorMessage: Cannot specify uartTx and uartRx on same pin!

analogPins.description: Information about each analog pin present on this board.

direction.description: This pin's direction, either INPUT or OUTPUT. For pins that are input or output ONLY, leave blank if it supports both.

hasPWM.description: If true, this digital pin supports general PWM output, and thus PWM components.

hasServo.description: If true, hasPWM should also be true, and this PWM-enabled pin also supports servo components.

isHardwired.description: If true, this pin is wired directly to a built-in component. It will only be available to be selected when adding a component of that type.

i2cPorts.description: Information about the I2C ports present on this board.

esptool.description: Installation metadata for boards that use the web-based WipperSnapper firmware installer

structure.description: The list of files and their filesystem offsets.
